text: Music from the World Beyond is the first album by stoner rock quartet The Mushroom River Band. It was released in 2000 and contains twelve tracks. ==Track listing== #"To the World Beyond" #"Mud-Crusher" #"Racing" #"Way to Go" #"29' 2½" #"The Mushroom River" #"More Beer" #"Addicted" #"Sir B's Tune" #"A Sad Story" #"Nurse" #"Free" #"Loser's Blues" (bonus track for Japan only) ==References== Category:2000 debut albums Category:The Mushroom River Band albums Category:MeteorCity albums
title: Music for the World Beyond
